title: Header Query
code:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA AS LIBRARY, TABLE_NAME AS TABLE, COLUMN_NAME AS FIELD, COLUMN_TEXT AS DESCRIPTION, DATA_TYPE, LENGTH --List fields that will be on output
FROM QSYS2.SYSCOLUMNS --Table you are looking in
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE 'CP1NW' -- Environment Name (Database)
AND TABLE_NAME = 'BLSEIT'-- File Name (Table)
ORDER BY LIBRARY, ORDINAL_POSITION;
